description:
While Kenshiro and Mamiya fight in Cassandra, Lin and Bat hold onto hope and wait for news of their victory.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hokuto Ni Sen Nen no Higeki! Ken-ou no Ashioto ga Kikoeru!!
The North Star`s 2000 Years of Tragedy! I Can Hear Ken-Oh`s Footsteps!
北斗二千年の悲劇! 拳王の足音が聞こえる!!
